Privacy Policy

Last Updated: 2025-Jun-22

Welcome to Vakit Wear. We value your privacy and want you to know that our App does not collect, store, or share any personal data.

No Data Collection

Vakit Wear is designed with your privacy in mind. The App does not gather any personal or usage data from its users. We do not use cookies or any tracking technologies.

Contact Information

If you have any questions regarding this policy, please feel free to contact us at info@sret.tr.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

Any changes or updates to this Privacy Policy will be posted on this page. We encourage you to review our Privacy Policy periodically.

By using Vakit Wear, you agree to this Privacy Policy in its entirety.
